Texts.Chs: 耳廓狐对蚁族人的看法
如果我们要说的话，我们要求守护团宣布这些恐怖虫人是违法的。非法化他们！送到没有正常生物的地方。在家里，被虫子咬死是致命的。在太空中，每个虫人都可能咬人。 不。不不不。不。非法化他们。
Texts.Eng: If we have say, we ask Protectorate to Illegal the terror-bug-men. Illegal them! Send to place without normal creatures. At home, insect bite is kill. In space, EVERY BUG MAN IS PROBABLY BITE KILL. NO. NO NO NO. NO. Make illegal.

Texts.Chs: 好吧。鼠族人犯了第一个真正的错误，给耳廓狐的朋友。介绍有会思考的虫子，它们有飞船来进行星际跳跃。这可不妙。不。不不不。 一点也不喜欢，想要压制恐怖——直到恐怖——事物消失。鼠族人说不用担心，因为虫人单打独斗很愚蠢，需要群体协作。 但是他们有群体，而且很难被消灭。 你为什么让他们聚在一起？
Texts.Eng: Okay. Kirhos make first real mistake for Fenerox friends. Introduce to horrifying monster peoples. THERE IS INSECTS WITH THINK, AND THEY HAVE SHIPS FOR PLANET JUMP. THIS NOT GOOD. NO. NO NO NO. Not like at all, and want squash terror-things until terror-things is gone. Kirhos say not worry, as Insect-men stupid alone and need group. BUT THEN THEY HAVE GROUP AND ARE HARDER TO SQUASH. WHY YOU LET THEM GROUP?
